meaningMnemonic: When you ride a <radical>scooter</radical> you'll have a <radical>surplus</radical> of possible <kanji>route</kanji>s. Not only can you drive on any road, but you can ride on the sidewalk too!
readingMnemonic: You decide to take the fastest <kanji>route</kanji>, since you have so many options, and drive on the sidewalk. However, in doing so you run over every single <reading>toe</reading> (と) on every single person trying to walk there.
